snippet: Is Eric K. Shinseki, the secretary of the Veterans Affairs Department, too cloistered from the public and the press, and perhaps even from younger veterans?
abstract: Is Eric K. Shinseki, the secretary of the Veterans Affairs Department, too cloistered from the public and the press, and perhaps even from younger veterans?

headline.main: Veterans Affairs Chief Criticized Over What Some See as His Low Profile
